TEXT.TITLE: SHOE TOWN INC <SHU> YEAR ENDED JAN THREE 1987
TEXT.BODY: Shr 51 cts vs 75 cts Net 5,524,000 vs 8,094,000 Revs 142.4 mln vs 137.2 mln NOTE: 1986 and 1985 year net includes loss 785,000 dlrs or eight cts a share and 59,000 dlrs or one ct a share, respectively, for discontinued operations. 1985 year ended December 28, 1985. Reuter
